titles.title: Providing for the sine die adjournment of the first session of the One Hundred Seventh Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 40. Record Vote Number: 379.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/20/2001--Passed House without amendment. Provides for the sine die adjournment of the House of Representatives and the Senate on either December 20 or 21, 2001.
